lines.text: You are right. I am the devil!
You have sent for me, Father Donaldo?
Hawk, sister Sparrow has been adapted and taken into our worst nightmare.
You mean my sister that has become your sister?
Yes, our sister sister. You must go now to rescue her!
The wheelzone! Mhm! What's going on around here?
Nothing for you, my friend but I do know this is Pharoah's territory and you are trespassing!
Me? Trespassing? I don't think so!
We shall see about that, won't we?
I shall have my revange now!
